tool_description: Gathers articles about skincare and leads you to them
name: Skincare API
title: Skincare API

api_list.name: Get All Skincare Tips
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all tips about Skincare.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://skincare-api.p.rapidapi.com/skincare"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skincare-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://skincare-api.p.rapidapi.com/skincare"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skincare-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
